faq1.question: How does the free website bonus work?
faq1.answer: When you sign a 4-month contract for the Marketing Package Full Service, you get a professional website completely FREE (value up to €800). If you already have a website, we can redesign it (value up to €600). The website remains your property even after the contract expires.

faq2.question: What happens after the 4-month contract?
faq2.answer: After 4 months, you can continue with the services at the same price, customize the package to your needs, or terminate the contract. The website you received remains your property regardless of your decision.

faq3.question: How much budget should I allocate for advertising?
faq3.answer: Advertising budget depends on your goals and industry. We recommend a minimum budget of €200-300 per month for combined Facebook/Instagram and Google Ads campaigns. We will help you optimize your budget for the best results.

faq4.question: Can I track campaign results?
faq4.answer: Absolutely! You receive detailed monthly reports on all activities - post performance, reach, engagement, ad statistics, conversions and ROI (return on investment). You can track progress in real-time.

faq5.question: What does the collaboration process look like?
faq5.answer: After signing the contract, we hold an initial meeting where we define the strategy, goals and tone of communication. Then we create content that you can review and approve before publishing. We communicate regularly and adjust the strategy based on results.

faq6.question: Can I choose what content goes on social media?
faq6.answer: Of course! You have complete control and approval over all content before it is published. We work as a team and aim to create content that best represents your brand.
